89589.text: CSINode initialization does not crash kubelet on startup when APIServer is not reachable or kubelet has not the right credentials yet.
89589.markdown: CSINode initialization does not crash kubelet on startup when APIServer is not reachable or kubelet has not the right credentials yet. ([#89589](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89589), [@jsafrane](https://github.com/jsafrane)) [SIG Storage]
89589.author: jsafrane

90019.text: Fixes a bug defining a default value for a replicas field in a custom resource definition that has the scale subresource enabled
90019.markdown: Fixes a bug defining a default value for a replicas field in a custom resource definition that has the scale subresource enabled ([#90019](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90019), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery, CLI, Cloud Provider, Cluster Lifecycle and Instrumentation]
90019.author: liggitt

90057.text: An issue preventing GCP cloud-controller-manager running out-of-cluster to initialize new Nodes is now fixed.
90057.markdown: An issue preventing GCP cloud-controller-manager running out-of-cluster to initialize new Nodes is now fixed. ([#90057](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90057), [@ialidzhikov](https://github.com/ialidzhikov)) [SIG Apps and Cloud Provider]
90057.author: ialidzhikov

90243.text: Fixed a regression running kubectl commands with  --local or --dry-run flags when no kubeconfig file is present
90243.markdown: Fixed a regression running kubectl commands with  --local or --dry-run flags when no kubeconfig file is present ([#90243](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90243), [@soltysh](https://github.com/soltysh)) [SIG API Machinery, CLI and Testing]
90243.author: soltysh

90324.text: Fix flaws in Azure CSI translation

90324.author: andyzhangx

90373.text: Avoid unnecessary scheduling churn when annotations are updated while Pods are being scheduled.
90373.markdown: Avoid unnecessary scheduling churn when annotations are updated while Pods are being scheduled. ([#90373](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90373), [@fabiokung](https://github.com/fabiokung)) [SIG Scheduling]
90373.author: fabiokung

90378.text: Fix: Init containers are now considered for the calculation of resource requests when scheduling

90425.text: Provides a fix to allow a cluster in a private Azure cloud to authenticate to ACR in the same cloud.
90425.markdown: Provides a fix to allow a cluster in a private Azure cloud to authenticate to ACR in the same cloud. ([#90425](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90425), [@DavidParks8](https://github.com/DavidParks8)) [SIG Cloud Provider]

90468.text: Fixes a regression in 1.17 that dropped cache-control headers on API requests
90468.markdown: Fixes a regression in 1.17 that dropped cache-control headers on API requests ([#90468](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90468), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]

- base-images: Use debian-base:v2.1.0 (includes CVE fixes)
- base-images: Use debian-iptables:v12.1.0 (includes CVE fixes)
